title: Facebook parent Meta Platforms beats lawsuit over Apple privacy, COO Sandberg disclosures
description: The Oakland, California-based judge also turned aside claims that Meta knew its transition to Reels, which copied TikTok's short-form video format, would hurt revenue because it offered fewer ads per hour than older formats.
content: Meta Platforms won the dismissal of a lawsuit claiming it defrauded shareholders by concealing how changes to Apple's privacy settings would make Facebook and Instagram less desirable for advertisers.
cleaned_content: meta platforms won the dismissal of a lawsuit claiming it defrauded shareholders by concealing how changes to apples privacy settings would make facebook and instagram less desirable for advertisers
